name: real-estate-project
description: Full-stack real estate application with property listings and admin panel

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:main && npm run install:admin
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd backend1 && npm run setup
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:main" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:admin
